description: Dashboard of Kubernetes / OpenShift volume information at namespace level as exported by Prometheus connected to Kubernetes / OpenShift.

panels.title: Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate

targets.expr: count (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes {namespace="$namespace"}) and (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes {namespace="$namespace"})) / (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes {namespace="$namespace"})) >= ($pvc_percent_used_warning_threshold / 100)) or vector (0)

panels.title: Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold
